name: Banh_INF651_FinalProject
description: - [ ] The current weather conditions for a default location should display when the app loads. The weather display should include the icon provided by the API.    - [ ] Users should be able to save their location as persistent data which is used as the default when the app loads    - [ ] Users should be able to search for the current weather in other locations    - [ ] Users should be able to navigate your app with a keyboard and screen reader    - [ ] You will deploy your app to a free Netlify account by enabling continuous deployment from GitHub to Netlify
